shortdesc.ph: Deletes the spatial position information of the specified remote user.
Deletes the spatial position information of the specified remote user.
Deletes the spatial position information of the specified remote user.
Deletes the spatial position information of a specified remote user.

section.p: After this method is successfully called, the local user will no longer hear the specified remote user. To avoid wasting computing resources after leaving the channel, you need to call this method to delete the spatial position information of the specified remote user. Otherwise, the spatial position information of that user will be retained. When the number of remote users exceeds the maximum number of audio streams set in , the SDK will automatically unsubscribe from the audio streams of the farthest users based on relative distance.

After this method is successfully called, the local user will no longer hear the specified remote user. To avoid wasting computational resources after leaving the channel, you need to call this method to remove the spatial position information of the specified remote user. Otherwise, the spatial position information of that user will be retained. When the number of remote users exceeds the maximum number of audio streams that can be received as set in , the SDK will automatically unsubscribe from the audio streams of the farthest users based on relative distance.

After this method is successfully called, the local user will no longer hear the specified remote user. After leaving the channel, to avoid wasting computing resources, you need to call this method to delete the spatial position information of the specified remote user. Otherwise, the user's spatial position information will continue to be stored. When the number of remote users exceeds the number of audio streams set in , the SDK will automatically unsubscribe from the audio streams of the farthest users based on relative distance.

After this method is successfully called, the local user will no longer hear the specified remote user. After leaving the channel, to avoid wasting computing resources, you need to call this method to delete the spatial position information of the specified remote user. Otherwise, the spatial position information of that user will be retained. When the number of remote users exceeds the maximum number of audio streams set by , the SDK will automatically stop subscribing to the audio streams of the farthest users based on relative distance.

plentry.pd: User ID. Must be the same as the user ID used when joining the channel.
User ID. Must match the user ID used when the user joined the channel.
User ID. Must match the user ID used when joining the channel.
User ID. Must be the same as the ID used when the user joined the channel.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting.
